channel.title: Crowns for other people? PI
channel.description:
Well I was just wondering would there be anyway to give players with Donator = 2 in their char file a crown, I know people with = 1 have a crown but not = 2. Would there be anyway and if so how? Please help me :D
(I know that in ::yell, I added <img=1> [MOD] </img> but thats in the actual command obv :D )
- Mikey :cool:
